title: Intercultural Communication: Global Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and awareness of cultural diversity
context.additional_context: Asynchronous/Synchronous Collaborative Learning Environments Using Smartphones, Including Real-Time/Recorded Discussions with Overseas Learners

learning_goals: Learners can compare communication styles across three cultural contexts and explain key differences.
Learners can analyze two or more communication misunderstandings arising from cultural contexts and propose solutions.
Learners can complete a cross-cultural comparison project with an international learner team using smartphone-based collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
